marketLeader.title: Become Market Leader
marketLeader.description: Conquer the largest market share by 1992

step1.title: Develop Computers
step1.description: Choose CPU, RAM, Graphics and a stylish case. Takes 1-2 quarters.

step2.title: Distribute Budget
step2.description: Marketing = more sales | Development = faster computers | Research = custom chips

step3.title: Complete Quarters
step3.description: View your sales, market position and competitor moves.

marketing.title: Marketing Budget
marketing.description: Directly proportional to sales. More marketing = reach more customers.

development.title: Development Budget
development.description: Speeds up computer development. 2x budget = 2x faster.

research.title: Research Budget
research.description: 5% chance per quarter for custom chip. More budget = higher chance.

warning.title: ⚠️ Warning!
warning.description: You start with $5M and have ongoing costs of $30k/month. Without income you'll go bankrupt after ~13 years. Develop profitable computers quickly!
